content: Where there's demand, there will be supply — that's the basic principle of commerce. And perhaps, sensing your activity in the market...
{A抱歉}Hoho, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, welcome home! I see you've been trading those in-demand crops across a range of different planets.
This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Here, take it, and keep watering the Luca Arbor.
